Name: mediawiki-beta
Overview: Docker container for MediaWiki running on Alpine, S6-overlay, Nginx, PHP-FPM, MediaWiki Parsoid service, WYSIWYG VisualEditor extension, along with other extensions. A CLI menu to simplify managing extensions, backups, database updates, and service configurations, scripts that handle setup and Mediawiki upgrades, and *optional* MariaDB add-in.

@attributes.Name: Allow Mediawiki Upgrades
@attributes.Description:
Allow MediaWiki to automatically be upgraded with new docker images.</br>
Set 'enable' to allow upgrades.

@attributes.Name: Install MySQL/MariaDB
@attributes.Description: OPTIONAL: Set 'true' to install built in MySQL/MariaDB

@attributes.Name: MySQL Root Password
Backup On Start
File Uploads Dir
@attributes.Description:
OPTIONAL: Set a host path for file uploads. <br>
Container Path: /config/assets

@attributes.Name: Backup Dir
@attributes.Description:
OPTIONAL: Set a host path for backups. <br>
Container Path: /config/backup
